characters.name: Riley Shadow
characters.description: Quiet and mysterious with the power to move objects with her mind.

characters.name: Zane Storm
characters.description: Reckless hero battling inner demons with the force of electricity.

characters.name: Aria Ember
characters.description: Fierce and passionate, she commands fire with graceful precision.

characters.name: Kai Frost
characters.description: Calm and collected, creating ice sculptures mid-battle.

characters.name: Nova Vega
characters.description: Energy manipulator from another galaxy, seeking her place on Earth.
